summary: The diff updates the map to navigate with a macro-region search param and updates the destinations page to filter by that param, plus adds region-based destination counts to map tooltips. However, the diff evidence is insufficient to confirm that new offbeat destinations were added across all five macro-regions with complete Pulga-style detail fields, and it does not show explicit handling for unknown/unsupported region ids.

missing_requirements.requirement: If an unknown/unsupported region id is encountered, the app falls back to showing all destinations (or a clear empty-state), and does not default to North India.
missing_requirements.reason: DestinationsPage casts the URL param to MacroRegion and unconditionally calls getDestinationsByMacroRegion(regionParam) when regionParam is present; the diff does not show validation or fallback behavior for unsupported values.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add offbeat destinations to ALL macro-regions (North, South, East, West, Northeast) in the same Pulga-style detail format (tagline, heroImage, snapshot, detailedDescription, transport, accommodation, localTransport, budgetBreakdown, budgetTotal, faqs).
missing_requirements.reason: The provided destinations.ts diff excerpt only shows the Pulga entry (macroRegion: 'north') and is truncated; there is no clear diff evidence of multiple newly added destinations spanning south/east/west/northeast with all required detail fields and unique content.
